A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don't listen to the butthurt fanboy purists! No matter what they see they will HATE it.  This movie is fantastic! The performances are all FANTASTIC.  Every single actor pulled their A game.  The humour is quite funny\, and I dare fanboys to compare it to their beloved episode 6.  1 word: ewoks.  There was a LOT of character developement in this movie.  Every character had something.  Here is a list:  Rey and Kylo Ren's conflict/friendship? Was stunning and one of the MAIN highlights of the film.  It was a FANTASTIC performance from each.  Poe's struggle against power was also something I loved.  Luke\, though not what many people expected\, was the highlight of the film for me.  Mark Hamill put out the best performance of his life.  Another thing I loved was the Yoda part.  They used a puppet\, which was done specifically for the fanboys.  The one plot I didn't much enjoy was Finn and Rose's.  I felt like it was a little forced (geddit) that being said\, I thought the casino planet was very cool\, and I loved Benicio Del Toro's  character.  The plot was pretty great.  The characters were pretty great.  The locations were pretty great.  The effects were pretty great.  Enough said!
